_sText: Prefab Timer ( Degrees ) --- Well, i made this simple prefab some time ago but i forgot to send it to fpsb ( Weird, i know... ). Ok, this "clock" timer is made of: 1 func_tracktrain 1 func_rotating 1 logic_timer --- What it does? Each 18 seconds, 1 laser ( env_laser ) and 1 spotlight ( point_spotlight ), will turn on, after some seconds, it will turn off. But you can use it for other things ( like teleports ), just changing the timer output to your teleport ( don't forget that your teleport needs to be disabled ) --- I just made this prefab because there is people who might don't know that, but there's much people who knows that. So, if you use it in your map, you don't need to credit me. --- After i will make a tutorial of how to make it. --- Video: ( extremely nice music :D ) --- Prefab made by Arroba If you like it. Please comment and rate!
